goal.ch:
(1)地震領域：使學生了解影響地震波傳遞的效應，目前地震相關研究之進展，並做口頭報告之練習。
(2)地球物理領域：透過專題研究與討論，讓學生學習不同地球物理探測方法及它們在大地構造、地殼變動、地下資源、環境變遷等地球科學議題上之應用。
(3)地質領域：使學生了解岩石圈地表與地下地質作用與地質營力，了解目前台灣地質相關研究之進展，並做口頭報告之練習。
goal.en:
(1)Seismic Research Interests：Let students learn the effects of seismic wave propagations, understand current research progresses, and present research results themselves.
(2)Geophysical Research Interests：Through project research and discussion, students are expected to learn various geophysical prospecting methods and their applications on earth sciences such as active tectonics, crustal movement, subsurface natural resources, and environment impacts.
(3)Geological Research Interests：Students will learn surficial and internal geological processes of the lithosphere. Current progress and research directions for the geology of Taiwan will be introduced. Students will need to present to present their study results

outline.ch:
(1)地震領域：地震震源效應、地震路徑效應、地震場址效應、參與研究者的專題討論、選定相關主題，進行研究及報告。
(2)地球物理領域：地震震波測勘、重力及電磁探勘、近地表地球物理探勘、海洋地球物理及探勘、衛星大地測量與遙測
(3)地質領域：沉積岩介紹、變質岩介紹、火成岩介紹、台灣地質、目前台灣地質研究方向、學生選擇專題研究題目、學生進行口頭研究成果發表。
outline.en:
(1)Seismic Research Interests：Seismic source effects、Seismic path effects、Seismic site effects、Joining the researcher’s seminar、Select the topic, read the papers and practice the oral presentation
(2)Geophysical Research Interests：Seismic prospecting、Gravity and Magnetotelluric prospecting、Near-surface geophysical prospecting、Marine geophysical prospecting、Satellite geodesy and remote sensing
(3)Geological Research Interests：Introduction of Sedimentary Geology、Introduction of Metamorphic Petrology、Introduction of Igneous Petrology、Taiwan Geology、Research directions of Taiwan Geology、Selection of Special Topics for Students、Oral Presentations by Students

textbook.ch: 無特定書籍，以學生選定主題之相關期刊。
textbook.en: Journal papers and literatures on specific research topics
